pr_title: fix: [DHIS2-9520] Adding user DB settings into interceptor (patch/2.35.0)

timeline.message: fix: [DHIS2-9520] Adding user DB settings into interceptor (patch/2.35)

timeline.author: netroms

replies.bodyText: I see @slf4j is annotated, but it is not in use, we should probably remove it.
replies.author: netroms

replies.bodyText:
This was part of the original file, it was just reordered.
But we do not have anyone using it in the class actually, and it can be removed for sure
Good catch 👍
replies.author: maikelarabori
